about.title: About
about.description: is a ready-to-use Minecraft server management panel that supports multiple platforms such as Bukkit, Fabric, and Forge.
about.info.author: Author
login.title: Minecraft Server Management Panel
login.form.title: Login to OPanel
login.form.description: You need an access key to log in to the OPanel dashboard.
login.form.input.label: Access Key
login.form.input.temporarily-banned: Too many verification attempts. Please try again later.
login.reset.title: Reset the Key
login.reset.content.line1: If you are a server administrator and the key has been lost, you can reset the key by @b{action1} and @b{action2}.
login.reset.content.line2: For detailed steps, please refer to the docs:
login.reset.content.line3: For configuration file path, please refer to:
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.error: Unable to connect to the server
dashboard.info.controls.stop.alert.title: Are you sure to stop the server?
dashboard.info.controls.stop.alert.descr: This operation will save all server information and shut down the server. OPanel will also be inaccessible. You can manually start the server from the backend afterwards.
dashboard.players.title: Online Player
dashboard.monitor.title: Resource Monitor
dashboard.time.title: Time
dashboard.time.uptime: The server has been running for
dashboard.time.ingame-time.tooltip: Please refer to the actual in-game time; this is for reference only.
dashboard.tps.title: TPS Monitor
dashboard.system.title: System
dashboard.system.dialog.title: System Info
dashboard.system.dialog.description: View detailed information about the server system here.
dashboard.terminal.title: Terminal
dashboard.favicon.title: Change server favicon
dashboard.favicon.description: Upload an image here to use as the server's new icon.
dashboard.favicon.error.400: Image format error, please upload a 64x64 png file.
dashboard.favicon.input.label: Upload Image
dashboard.favicon.input.description: Please choose a 64x64 png image as the server icon.
dashboard.favicon.input.error: Incorrect image size, the dimensions should be 64*64
dashboard.motd.title: Edit Motd
dashboard.motd.description.line: Edit and preview the server Motd here. @s{warning}
dashboard.motd.description.warning: Note: This feature is unstable on Fabric for unknown reasons.
dashboard.motd.textarea.max-lines: The maximum number of lines for the Motd is 2
dashboard.properties.title: Edit server.properties
dashboard.properties.description: Edit the server configuration file here, or you can directly edit the {0} file in the server directory.
dashboard.properties.save.success.descri: Restart the server to apply the changes
dashboard.properties.hint1: The server needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect.
dashboard.properties.hint2: The server configuration attribute descriptions all come from {0} and {1}.
saves.title: Saves
saves.description: Manage and upload save files in the server directory
saves.hint.line1: Drag the save archive (in zip format) onto the page to import. If the zip archive contains a single save folder, the name of the archive must match the folder name, otherwise the import will be rejected.
saves.hint.line2: Click the save file name to switch the current save. A server restart is required for the changes to take effect.
saves.fetch.error: Unable to retrieve the save list
saves.upload.error.description: The archive format is incorrect. Please upload a zip file.
saves.upload.error.400: The archive format is incorrect. Please upload a zip file containing the map save.
saves.dnd.label: Drag the map file here to upload
saves.progress.label: Uploading {0}...
saves.list.title: All Saves
saves.list.upload.title: Upload Save
saves.list.upload.input.label: Archive (zip format)
saves.list.item.switch.success.descripti: Restart the server to apply the changes
saves.list.item.switch.error: Unable to switch the current save file
saves.list.item.download.alert.title: Are you sure to save and download the current save "{0}"?
saves.list.item.download.alert.descripti: The save file to be downloaded is the one currently running on the server. The server will save the file before processing it, which may affect server performance.
saves.list.item.delete.alert.title: Are you sure to delete the save "{0}"?
saves.list.item.delete.alert.description: This action is irreversible, and deleted files cannot be recovered.
saves.edit.title: Edit Save
saves.edit.description: Edit the information of this save file here.
saves.edit.form.name.label: Archive Name
saves.edit.form.name.empty: The archive name cannot be empty
saves.edit.form.gamemode.label: Default game mode
saves.edit.form.difficulty.label: Difficulty
saves.edit.form.difficulty-locked.label: Difficulty Locked
saves.edit.form.hardcore.label: Hardcore Mode
saves.datapacks.title: Manage Datapacks
players.title: Players
players.description: Manage all online and offline players on the server, set whitelist and ban list
players.hint: Click on the player's name for more options.
players.ws.error: Cannot connect to the WebSocket of player list
players.banned-ips.title: Manage the Banned IPs
players.banned-ips.description: Add / remove banned IP addresses here.
players.banned-ips.fetch.error: Unable to retrieve the banned IP list
players.banned-ips.add.error: Unable to add this IP to the banned list
players.banned-ips.add.exist: This IP is already on the banned list
players.banned-ips.pardon.error: Unable to remove this IP from the banned list
players.banned-ips.input.placeholder: Please enter an IP address to add...
players.edit-whitelist.title: Edit Whitelist
players.edit-whitelist.description: Edit the server player whitelist here, or you can directly edit the {0} file in the server directory.
players.player-list.title: Player List
players.player-list.columns.name: Name
players.banned-list.title: Banned List
players.banned-list.columns.name: Name
players.edit.title: Edit Player
players.edit.description: Set and manage this player's status and permissions here.
players.edit.form.gamemode.label: Game Mode
players.edit.form.op.label: OP
players.action.op.success: Successfully granted OP privileges to this player
players.action.op.error: Unable to grant this player OP permissions
players.action.deop.success: Successfully revoked this player's OP permissions
players.action.deop.error: Unable to remove this player's OP privileges
players.action.add-to-whitelist.success: The player has been added to the whitelist
players.action.add-to-whitelist.error: Unable to add this player to the whitelist
players.action.remove-from-whitelist.suc: The player has been removed from the whitelist
players.action.remove-from-whitelist.err: Unable to remove this player from the whitelist
players.action.kick.success: The player has been kicked out
players.action.kick.prompt.title: Kick Player
players.action.kick.prompt.description: Kick the player out of the server; the player can rejoin the server afterward.
players.action.kick.prompt.label: Reason
players.action.kick.prompt.placeholder: Please enter the reason for kicking out...
players.action.ban.prompt.title: Ban player
players.action.ban.prompt.description: Kick the player from the server and add them to the ban list; afterward, the player will not be able to rejoin the server.
players.action.ban.prompt.label: Reason
players.action.ban.prompt.placeholder: Please enter the reason for the ban
players.action.remove.success: The player's game data has been deleted
players.action.remove.error: Unable to delete this player's game data
players.action.remove.kick-reason: The administrator has cleared your player data
players.action.remove.alert.title: Are you sure to delete {0}'s game data?
players.action.remove.alert.description1: This action will erase all of the player's game data, and the deleted data cannot be recovered.
players.action.remove.alert.description2: This action will kick the player out of the server and delete all of their game data, and the deleted data cannot be recovered.
players.action.set-gamemode.success: The player's game mode has been set to {0} mode
players.action.set-gamemode.error: Unable to set the game mode for this player
gamerules.title: Game Rules
gamerules.description: Set the gamerules for the current world of the server
gamerules.fetch.error: Unable to retrieve server game rule information
gamerules.hint1: Changes to the game rules need to be saved to take effect.
gamerules.hint3: The name and description of the game rules are both from {0}
plugins.title: Plugins
terminal.title: Terminal
terminal.ws.error: Unable to connect to the WebSocket of terminal
terminal.input.empty: Please enter a command to send
logs.title: Logs
logs.description: Manage and view all log files of the server
logs.clear.success: All logs except the current one have been cleared
logs.clear.alert.title: Are you sure to clear all log files?
logs.clear.alert.description: This operation will not clear the current server logs, but any cleared log files cannot be recovered.
logs.columns.name: Log Name
logs.action.delete.error.403: The current log cannot be deleted
coc.title: Code of Conduct
coc.description: Manage and edit the server's code of conduct to regulate player behavior within the server
coc.error.503: This server version does not support the code of conduct.
coc.fetch.error: Unable to obtain code of conduct information
coc.save.error: Unable to save code of conduct
coc.empty.title: No Code of Conducts
coc.empty.description: No code of conduct has been written on this server yet. You can create the first code of conduct document here.
coc.empty.create: Create a New Code of Conduct
coc.empty.create.error: Unable to create code of conduct
coc.item.delete.error: Unable to delete Code of Conduct: {0}.txt
coc.item.delete.alert.title: Are you sure to delete the Code of Conduct document {0}.txt?
coc.item.delete.alert.description: Deleted code of conduct documents cannot be recovered.
coc.create.title: Create a new code of conduct
coc.create.description: Create a code of conduct for a specific language here.
coc.create.invalid-lang: Please enter a valid language code, such as: zh_cn
coc.create.exist: The language version to create already exists
coc.create.input.label: Language
coc.create.input.placeholder: Please enter the language code... (e.g., zh_cn)
coc.create.input.description:
Language codes can refer to {0}
Follow the {1} and {2} international standards.
bukkit-config.title: Bukkit Configurations
bukkit-config.error.503: This server is not a bukkit-series server.
bukkit-config.fetch.error: Unable to retrieve the configuration files

settings.terminal.log-level.description: The minimum log level displayed on the terminal
settings.terminal.convert-ansi-code.desc: Convert ANSI codes in the terminal to more readable HTML

settings.login-banner.description: Customize the banner on the left side of the login page.
settings.login-banner.upload.error: Failed to set login page banner

settings.login-banner.reset.error: Failed to reset login page banner
settings.login-banner.input.label: Upload Image
settings.login-banner.input.description: Please upload an image in png, jpg, jpeg, or webp format as the login page banner.
settings.security.title: Change Access Key
settings.security.description: Change the access key for the OPanel panel here.
settings.security.error.401: Unable to change the access key
settings.security.form.current-key.label: Current key
settings.security.form.current-key.place: Please enter the current access key...
settings.security.form.new-key.min: The access key length should not be less than 6
